scriptLines: {D B D U N S Number} as string,

{VEND$REQUIRE PO ACKNOWLEDGEMEN} = iif({VEND$REQUIRE PO ACKNOWLEDGEMEN}=='1', 'No iSupplier Interaction', iif({VEND$REQUIRE PO ACKNOWLEDGEMEN}=='2', 'Full iSupllier Interaction (Acknowledgement and Asn)', iif({VEND$REQUIRE PO ACKNOWLEDGEMEN}=='3', 'Acknowledge Only', {VEND$REQUIRE PO ACKNOWLEDGEMEN})))) ~> derivedColumn1
derivedColumn1, aggregate2 join(select4@{VENDOR NAME} == aggregate2@{VENDOR NAME},
aggregate2, derivedColumn1 join(aggregate2@{VENDOR NAME} == select4@{VENDOR NAME},

union1 derive({Account Type} = iif({VEND$REQUIRE PO ACKNOWLEDGEMEN}=='Acknowledge Only', 'Acknowledge Only', iif({VEND$REQUIRE PO ACKNOWLEDGEMEN}=='No iSupplier Interaction', 'None', iif(isNull({VEND$REQUIRE PO ACKNOWLEDGEMEN}), 'None', iif(TERMS=='ERS-Net 40', 'iSupplier-ERS', iif(TERMS=='ERS-Net 45','iSupplier-ERS', iif(TERMS=='ERS-Net 60','iSupplier-ERS', 'iSupplier - Acknowledge & ASN'))))))) ~> derivedColumn2
select8, derivedColumn2 join(select8@{Vendor Number} == union1@{VENDOR NUMBER},
derivedColumn2, select8 join(union1@{VENDOR NUMBER} == select8@{Vendor Number},
{PO Line Creation Fiscal Date} as string,
{Shipm$Mrp Pull In Message Root} as string,
